description.raw:
The hello world plugin tutorial had to be forked for gazebo6 (pull request #243) to set `CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS` in the `CMakeLists.txt`; otherwise the build will fail. Fortunately, several of the other plugin tutorials didn't have to be updated, since they were piggy-backed onto the hello world tutorial.

In order to prevent a fork, I'm updating the world_edit tutorial to piggy-back the hello world tutorial as well. The main difference is using the same folder name and appending data to the CMakeLists.txt instead of creating a new one.

* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=plugins_world_properties&cat=write_plugin&branch=world_edit
